Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the collection of the  commercial motor vehicle tax for medallion taxicabs.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Collection of the  commercial motor vehicle tax for medallion taxicabs.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 9% per annum for real property where the assessed value is not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000), or not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for FY'13 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 18% per annum for real property where the assessed value is over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate to be charged for FY'13 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 18% per annum for real property where the assessed value is over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000), or not more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for FY'13 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000), or over two hundred fifty thousand dollars ($250,000) per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for FY'13 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over $250,000, or over $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at one percent (1.0%) per annum for Fiscal Year 2013.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at 1.0% per annum for FY'13.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents and transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for early payment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2013, pursuant to the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for FY'13 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Assembly to pass A.10352, and the Governor to sign such legislation into law, amending the tax law in relation to extending the authorization of New York City to provide a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, unincorporated business tax, and banking corporation tax of such city.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Extending the authorization of NYC to provide a biotechnology credit against the general corporation tax, unincorporated business tax, and banking corporation tax of such city.  (A.10352)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation which would authorize any city having a population of one million or more to provide an angel investor credit against the unincorporated business tax and personal income tax of such city for certain qualified emerging companies and medical technology companies.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorize any city having a population of one million or more to provide an angel investor credit against the unincorporated business tax and personal income tax of such city for certain qualified emerging companies and medical technology companies.

Items.Title: Roll Call
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to verification of data for certain exemptions administered by the Department of Finance.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the collection of the  commercial motor vehicle tax for medallion taxicabs.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Collection of the  commercial motor vehicle tax for medallion taxicabs.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2013 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents and transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for early payment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2013, pursuant to the City Charter.
